powers.name: Villain_Pets.Stalker_EpicSoulMastery_Snipe.Moonbeam_Quick
powers.display_help: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Superior
